title: Can't ban a champion ?
body:
So I'm currently serving a 30 minute ban because I wasn't able to select any champions to ban, it happened once and I got a 6 min ban, I closed League and reloaded for the next game, to then get same issue and get a 30 min ban?

http://image.prntscr.com/image/9482122a28c8464da26a636dddb1b85b.jpeg

Isn't my picture, I can't get into a game anytime soon to get one but this is exactly what's happening to me.. Work around?

replies.body: having this problem after the last patch... Champs don't show up and am unable to ban

> [{quoted}](name=DeathOwesMEaBeer,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lp4YZ4rE,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-04T14:04:01.449+0000)
>
> So I&#039;m currently serving a 30 minute ban because I wasn&#039;t able to select any champions to ban, it happened once and I got a 6 min ban, I closed League and reloaded for the next game, to then get same issue and get a 30 min ban?
> 
> http://image.prntscr.com/image/9482122a28c8464da26a636dddb1b85b.jpeg
> 
> Isn&#039;t my picture, I can&#039;t get into a game anytime soon to get one but this is exactly what&#039;s happening to me.. Work around?

same, i had the exact same problem and im now serving a 30 min queue ban.
Just had this same issue, except champions reappeared when it was actually my turn to ban, but i couldn't select them and ended up with a 5 minutes queue dodge penalty

In that screenshot, it appears that your client has scrolled down on the champion list.  The champion list often can erroneously scroll as if every single champion were listed, with the entire rest of the list being empty.  Try dragging that scroll bar you see up to the top.

And Riot should get on fixing that, btw.

It sounds like you have a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) penalty, which can escalate to 30 minutes if it happens consistently.  Your connection might be unstable and having hiccups, which can cause you to lose sync from champion select or kicked off entirely.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this out.  Let me know if you have any questions!
